Multilevel cache status   On   Off
Multilevel cache requests  $MOD-MMADMIN-MULTILEVELCACHEREQUESTS^
Multilevel cache hits  $MOD-MMADMIN-MULTILEVELCACHEHITS^
Multilevel cache misses  $MOD-MMADMIN-MULTILEVELCACHEMISSES^
Multilevel max size  $MOD-MMADMIN-MULTILEVELCACHESIZE^
Multilevel cache performance  $MOD-MMADMIN-MULTILEVELCACHEPERFORMANCE^%
Show first 500 entry's of the LRU
